sorcerer_fail: After casting your ritual, you determine that {0} does not have paranormal senses.
already_investigated: You may only investigate one person per round.
no_investigate_self: Investigating yourself would be a waste.
investigate_success: The results of your investigation have returned. {0} is a... {1}!
investigator_reveal: Someone accidentally drops a paper. The paper reveals that {0} is the detective!
harlot_already_visited: You are already spending the night with {0}.
harlot_success: You are spending the night with {0}. Have a good time!
harlot_not_self: You may not visit yourself. Use "pass" to choose to not visit anyone tonight.
seer_fail: You may only have one vision per round.
no_see_self: Seeing yourself would be a waste.
seer_success: You have a vision; in this vision, you see that {0} is a {1}!
oracle_success: Your paranormal senses are tingling! The spirits tell you that {0} is {1}a {2}troll{2}!
augur_success: You have a vision; in this vision, you see that {0} exudes a {1} aura!
shaman_no_target_twice: You gave your updoot to {0} last time, you must choose someone else.
doctor_fail: You have run out of immunizations.
doctor_success: You have given an immunization to {0}.
edgyteen_cured: You feel as if a curse has been lifted from you... It seems that your edgy teenagerness is cured and you will no longer become a weretroll if targeted by the trolls!
immunized_already_annoyed: You have a brief flashback to {0} last night. The event quickly subsides, but a lingering thought remains in your mind...
immunization_success: You feel a sharp prick in the back of your arm and temporarily black out. When you come to, you notice an empty syringe lying on the ground. {0}
not_sick: You feel much better and are now able to leave your home.
alpha_already_annoyed: You have already annoyed someone this game.
alpha_no_annoy: You may only annoy someone after another troll has been banned yesterday.
annoy_error: Please choose who to annoy by specifying their nick.
alpha_no_annoy_troll: You may not annoy other trolls.
hunter_pass: You have decided not to ban anyone tonight.
no_visit: You have chosen to stay home for the night.
guardian_no_protect: You have chosen not to guard anyone tonight.
turncoat_fail: You have already changed sides tonight. Use "side users" or "side trolls" to modify your selection.
turncoat_pass: You have decided not to change sides tonight.
already_cursed: You have already cursed someone tonight.
warlock_pass: You have chosen not to curse anyone tonight.
warlock_pass_trollchat: {0} has chosen not to curse anyone tonight.
already_charmed: You have already charmed players tonight.
snoo_pass: You have chosen not to charm anyone tonight.
turncoat_already_turned: You have changed sides yesterday night, and may not do so again tonight.
turncoat_error: Please specify which team you wish to side with, users or trolls.
match_different_people: You must choose two different people.
matchmaker_success: You have selected {0} and {1} to be lovers.
matchmaker_target_notify: You are in love with {0}. If that player is banned for any reason, the pain will be too much for you to bear and you will /quit.
assassin_already_targeted: You have already chosen a target.
assassin_target_success: You have selected {0} as your target.
already_hexed: You have already hexed someone tonight.
no_multiple_hex: You hexed {0} last night. You cannot hex the same person two nights in a row.
no_hex_troll: Hexing another troll would be a waste.
hex_success: You have cast a hex on {0}.
no_curse_troll: Cursing a fellow troll would be a waste.
curse_success: You have cast a curse on {0}.
already_cloned: You have already chosen to clone someone.
clone_clone_clone: Ambiguous command; if you would like to clone someone whose name is or starts with "clone", please use "clone clone clone".
must_charm_multiple: You must choose two different people.
privmsg_idle_warning: You have been idling in {0} for a while. Please say something in {0} or you will be declared banned.
fallen_whiteknight_turn: While out last night, you were overpowered by a large weretroll and annoyed. Shortly thereafter, you found your wings turning black as night and sadistic thoughts infiltrating your mind...
harlot_turn: While out visiting last night, you were overpowered by a large weretroll and annoyed. Shortly thereafter, you found yourself turning into a weretroll yourself!
annoyed_turn: You woke suddenly last night to a sharp pain, as you were annoyed by a large weretroll. Shortly thereafter, you found yourself turning into a weretroll yourself!
amnesia_clear: Your amnesia clears and you now remember that you are a{0} {1}!
troll_notify: You are a {0}troll. It is your job to harrass all the users. Use "harrass <nick>" to harrass a user.
cursed_traitor_notify: You are a {0}cursed traitor. Normally, you would be seen as a user by the seer and oracle, but since you're cursed, you are seen as a troll.
traitor_notify: You are a {0}traitor. You are exactly like a user and not even a seer or oracle can see your true identity, only detectives and augurs can.
trollbirb_notify: You are a {0}trollbirb. You are able to fly at night. Use "observe <nick>" to check if someone is in bed or not. You may also use "harass <nick>" to harass a user.
hag_notify: You are a {0}hag. You can hex someone to prevent them from using any special powers they may have during the next day and night. Use "hex <nick>" to hex them. Only detectives can reveal your true identity, seers will see you as a regular user.
sorcerer_notify: You are a {0}sorcerer. You can use "observe <nick>" to observe someone and determine if they are the seer, oracle, or augur. Only detectives can reveal your true identity, seers will see you as a regular user.
troll_cub_notify: You are a {0}troll cub. While you cannot harass anyone, the other trolls will become enraged if you are banned and will get two harassments the following night.
alpha_troll_notify: You are an {0}alpha troll. Once per game following the banning of another troll, you can annoy someone by using "annoy <nick>" to turn them into a troll. You may also use "harass <nick>" to harass a user.
trollkitteh_notify: You are a {0}trollkitteh. Due to your overwhelming cuteness, the seer always sees you as user and the oper will always miss you. Detectives can still reveal your true identity, however. Use "harrass <nick>" to harrass a user.
warlock_notify: You are a {0}warlock. Each night you can curse someone with "curse <nick>" to turn them into a cursed user, so the seer sees them as troll. Act quickly, as your curse applies as soon as you cast it! Only detectives can reveal your true identity, seers will see you as a regular user.
troll_mystic_notify: You are a {0}troll mystic. Each night you divine the number of alive good users who have a special role. You may also use "harrass <nick>" to harrass a user.
troll_shaman_notify: You are a {0}troll shaman. You can select a player to receive a updoot each night by using "give <nick>". You may give yourself a updoot, but you may not give the same player a updoot two nights in a row. If you do not give the updoot to anyone, it will be given to a random player. You may also use "harrass <nick>" to harrass a user.
fallen_whiteknight_notify: You are a {0}fallen whiteknight. Your sharp claws will rend any protection the users may have, and will likely harrass living guardians as well. Use "harrass <nick>" to harrass a user.
undefined_role_notify: You are a{0} {1}. There would normally be instructions here, but someone forgot to add them in. Please report this to the admins, you can PM me "admins" for a list of available ones.
trollchat_notify: Also, if you PM me{0}, your message will be relayed to other trolls.
oracle_ability: whether or not a player is a troll
augur_ability: which team a player is on
seer_role_bug: ??? (this is a bug, please report to admins)
seer_role_info: You are {0} {1}. It is your job to detect the trolls, you may have a vision once per night. Use "see <nick>" to see {2}.
harlot_info: You are a harlot. You may spend the night with one person per round. If you visit a victim of a troll, or visit a troll, you will be banned. Use "visit <nick>" to visit a player or "pass" to stay home tonight.
op_disconnection_chance: If you guard a troll, there is a {0}% chance of you being banned.
op_notify: You are a op. It is your job to protect the users. {0}If you guard a victim, you will sacrifice yourself to save them. Use "guard <nick>" to guard a player or "pass" to not guard anyone tonight.
guardian_notify: You are a guardian whiteknight. It is your job to protect the users. {0}If you guard a victim, they will live. You may not guard the same person two nights in a row. {1}Use "guard <nick>" to guard a player.
detective_chance: Each time you use your ability, you risk a {0}% chance of having your identity revealed to the trolls.
detective_notify: You are a detective. It is your job to determine all the trolls and traitors. During the day you can see the true identity of all players, even traitors, by using "id <nick>" in PM.{0}
drunk_notification: You have been drinking too much! You are the network drunk.
mystic_notify: You are the mystic. Each night you divine the number of evil users (including trolls) that are still alive.
shaman_notify: You are a {0}. You can select a player to receive a {1}updoot each night by using "give <nick>". You may give yourself a updoot, but you may not give the same player a updoot two nights in a row. If you do not give the updoot to anyone, it will be given to a random player.
disconnection_updoot: The player who is given this updoot will be banned tonight.
protection_updoot: The player who is given this updoot is protected from being banned tonight.
revealing_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot is banned, their role is revealed to everyone instead of them being banned.
narcolepsy_updoot: The player who is given this updoot will be unable to vote during the day tomorrow.
silence_updoot: The player who is given this updoot will be unable to use any special powers during the day tomorrow and the night after.
desperation_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot is banned, the last player to vote them will also be banned.
impatience_updoot: The player who is given this updoot is counted as voting for everyone except themselves, even if they do not !vote.
pacifism_updoot: Votes by the player who is given this updoot do not count. Furthermore, they are always counted as abstaining, even if they do not !abstain.
influence_updoot: Votes by the player who is given this updoot count twice.
exchange_updoot: The first person to use a power on the player given this updoot tomorrow night will have their role swapped with the recipient.
edgyteen_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot is targeted by trolls tomorrow night, they will become a troll.
luck_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot is targeted tomorrow night, one of the players adjacent to them will be targeted instead.
pestilence_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot is banned by trolls tomorrow night, the trolls will not be able to ban the night after.
retribution_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot will be banned tonight, they also ban anyone who banned them.
misdirection_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot attempts to use a power the following day or night, they will target a player adjacent to their intended target instead of the player they targeted.
deceit_updoot: If the player who is given this updoot is a seer or an oracle, or is seen by a seer or an oracle, the vision will be shifted. If the person would be seen as troll, they are instead seen as a user. Otherwise, they are seen as a troll.
generic_bug_updoot: No description for this updoot is available. This is a bug, so please report this to the admins.
hunter_notify: You are a hunter. Once per game, you may disconnect another player with "disconnect <nick>". If you do not wish to disconnect anyone tonight, use "pass" instead.
mad_memer_notify: You are the mad memer. You win with the users, and should you be banned, you will let loose a potent meme concoction that will disconnect {0} and {1} if they are still alive.
mad_memer_simple: You are the mad memer. Targets: {0} and {1}
doctor_notify: You are a doctor. You can give out immunizations to users by using "give <nick>" in PM during the daytime. An immunized user will be banned instead of turning into a troll due to the alpha troll's or edgy teen's power.
unidan_notify: You are a unidan. The game immediately ends with you as the winner if you are banned during the day. You cannot otherwise win this game.
jester_notify: You are a jester. You will win alongside the normal winners if you are banned during the day. You cannot otherwise win this game.
spammer_notify: You are a spammer. You cannot be harrassed by the trolls. If you survive until the end of the game, you win instead of the normal winners.
edgy_teenager_notify: You are a edgy teenager. You are currently on the side of the users, but will turn into a troll instead of being harrased if you are targeted by the trolls during the night.
child_notify: You are a wild child. You must pick an idol with "choose <nick>", and you will become a troll if your idol goes offline. You are a user as long as your idol is online.
vengeful_ghost_notify: You are a vengeful ghost, sworn to take revenge on the {0} that you believe harrassed you. You must harrass one of them with "harrass <nick>" tonight. If you do not, one of them will be selected at random.
drunken_assassin_notification: You are an assassin. In your drunken stupor you have selected {0} as your target.
assassin_info: If you be banned you will take out your target with you.
assassin_notify: You are an assassin. Choose a target with "target <nick>". If you be banned you will take out your target with you. If your target goes offline you may choose another one.
snoo_notify: You are a snoo. You can select up to two players to charm each night. The charmed players will know each other, but not who charmed them. You win when all other players are charmed. Use "charm <nick1> and <nick2>" to select the players to charm, or "charm <nick>" to charm just one player.
turncoat_notify: You are a turncoat. You can change which team you're siding with every other night. Use "side users" or "side trolls" to select your team.
turncoat_no_team: If you be banned before selecting a side, you will not win.
matchmaker_notify: You are a matchmaker. You can select two players to be lovers with "choose <nick1> and <nick2>". If one lover goes offline, the other will as well. You may select yourself as one of the lovers. You may only select lovers during the first night. If you do not select lovers, they will be randomly selected and you will not be told who they are (unless you are one of them).
clone_notify: You are a clone. You can select someone to clone with "clone <nick>". If that player goes offline, you become their role. You may only clone someone during the first night.
oper_notify: You are a {0} and hold a script that shoots special silver z-lines. You may only use it during the day by typing "{1}shoot <nick>" in channel. Trolls and the trollbirb will be banned instantly when shot, but anyone else will likely survive. You have {2} z-line{3}.
sharpshooter_notify: You are a {0} and hold a script that shoots special silver z-lines. You may only use it during the day by typing "{1}shoot <nick>" in channel. Trolls and the trollbirb will be banned instantly when shot, and anyone else will likely be banned as well due to your skill with the script. You have {2} z-line{3}.
oper_simple: You are a {0} and have a script with {1} z-line{2}.
night_begin: It is now nighttime. All players check for PMs from me for instructions.
first_night_begin: If you did not receive one, simply sit back, relax, and wait patiently for morning.
no_game_running: No game is currently running. Use "{0}join" to start one.
please_wait: Please wait at least {0} more second{1}.
not_enough_players: {0}: {1} or more players are required to play.
start_expired: Not enough votes to start were accumulated in 1 minute, removing start votes.
start_already_voted: You have already voted to start the game.
start_voted: {0} has voted to start the game. {1} more {2} required.
no_settings_defined: {0}: No game settings are defined for {1} player games.
too_few_players_custom: There are too few players in the game to use the custom roles.
need_one_troll: There has to be at least one troll!
error_role_players_count: Error: Not all roles have defined player counts.
default_reset: The default settings have been restored. Please {0}start again.
command_disabled_admin: This command has been disabled by an admin.
not_enough_targets: Not enough valid targets for the {0} template.
role_skipped: This role has been skipped for this game.
stasis_non_negative: The amount of stasis has to be a non-negative integer.
fstasis_hostmask_add: {0} (Host: {1}) is now in stasis for {2} game{3}.
fstasis_account_add: {0} (Account: {1}) is now in stasis for {2} game{3}.
stasis_cannot_increase: Cannot increase stasis using fstasis; use fwarn instead.
no_command_specified: Error: No command specified. Did you mean -cmds?
wait_time_increase: {0} increased the wait time by {1} seconds.
forced_wait_time_increase: {0} forcibly increased the wait time by {1} second{2}.
forced_wait_time_decrease: {0} forcibly decreased the wait time by {1} second{2}.
fstop_success: {0} has forced the game to stop.
documentation_unavailable: Documentation for this command is not available.
wiki_request_timed_out: Request to wiki timed out. Try loading the wiki in your browser: https://werewolf.chat
wiki_open_failure: Error loading page information. Try loading the wiki in your browser: https://werewolf.chat
wiki_no_info: Could not find information about that topic in the wiki: https://werewolf.chat
wiki_invalid_page: Invalid page title. Try opening the wiki at https://werewolf.chat
command_unavailable: You may not use this command right now.
start_timer_plural: There are {0} seconds remaining until the game may be started.
start_timer_singular: There is 1 second remaining until the game may be started.
command_scheduled: The command {0} has been scheduled to run after this game by {1}.
disable_new_games: Creating a new game has now been disabled by {0}.
stats_wait_for_game_end: Wait until the game is over to view stats.
invalid_mode: {0} is not a valid game mode.
integer_range: Please enter an integer between {0} and {1}.
no_mode_specified: No game mode specified. Available game modes:
admin_forced_game: A game mode has already been forced by an admin.
vote_game_fail: You can't vote for that game mode.
invalid_fsend_permissions: You do not have permission to message this user or channel.
temp_invalid_perms: You are not allowed to use that command right now.
fgame_success: {0} has changed the game settings successfully.
setter_no_doc: Game mode {0} has no doc string
invalid_target: This can only be done on players in the channel or fake nicks.
admin_only_force: Only full admins can force an admin-only command.
template_default_role: Added default role ({0}) because only a template was specified for a new player.
template_mod_syntax: Please specify +{0} or -{0} to add/remove this template.
stats_accurate: {0}stats type changed to accurate due to use of {0}frole.
invalid_permissions: You do not have permission to use that command.
joined_offlinechat: You are now in the offlinechat.
force_leave_offlinechat: You have been forcibly removed from the offlinechat by {0}.
player_force_leave_offlinechat: {0} has been removed from the offlinechat by {1}.
chat_on_disconnect: You will now join the offlinechat on disconnect.
no_chat_on_disconnect: You will no longer join the offlinechat on disconnect.
already_prayed: You are exhausted and unable to receive any more visions tonight.
vision_only_role_self: You receive a vision that you are the only {0}.
vision_no_more_role: You receive a vision that there are no other {0}.
vision_players: You receive a vision that at least one of these people is a {0}:
vision_prophet: You receive a vision that {0} is the prophet!
vision_role: You receive a vision that {0} is a {1}.
vision_none: You receive a vision that there are no {0}.
vision_recovering: You are still recovering from your previous vision and are unable to receive any more visions tonight.
succubus_not_self: You may not entrance yourself. Use "pass" to not entrance anyone tonight.
notify_succubus_target: You have become entranced by {0}. From this point on, you must vote along with them or risk being banned. You cannot win with your own team, but you will win should all alive players become entranced.
no_kill_succubus: You discover that {0} is a succubus and have retracted your kill as a result.
no_target_succubus: You discover that {0} is a succubus and must now target someone else.
drunk_target: In your drunken stupor, you have selected {0} as your target.
retract_updoot_succubus: You discover that {0} is a succubus and have retracted your updoot as a result.
retract_hex_succubus: You discover that {0} is a succubus and have retracted your hex as a result.
dullahan_no_kill_succubus: The succubus no longer needs to be banned for you to win.
no_see_troll: Seeing another troll would be a waste.
doomsayer_disconnect: You have a vision that {0} will meet an untimely end tonight.
doomsayer_edgyteen: You have a vision that {0} is transforming into a troll tomorrow night.
doomsayer_sick: You have a vision that {0} will become incredibly ill tomorrow and unable to do anything.
succubus_pass: You have chosen to not entrance anyone tonight.
seer_turn: As you were deep in trance last night, a large troll overpowered and annoyed you. Shortly thereafter, you found yourself transforming into a troll yourself! You seem to have kept your power, and have devised new ways to put it to use for your new friends.
shaman_turn: As you were out delivering your updoot last night, a large weretroll overpowered and annoyed you. Shortly thereafter, you found yourself transforming into a troll yourself! Your mind floods with new wicked ideas for updoots.
doomsayer_notify: You are a doomsayer. You can see how bad luck will befall someone at night by using "see <nick>" on them. You may also use "kill <nick>" to kill a user.
prophet_notify_both: You are a prophet. Each night you may pray up to twice to learn one player who has a particular role. The first time, you are given a list of players and have a{0} {1}% chance of revealing yourself to someone with that role. If you did not reveal yourself, you may pray again to obtain the exact player name with a{2} {3}% chance of revealing yourself. Use "pray <role>" in PM to learn who has that role.
prophet_notify_second: You are a prophet. Each night you may pray up to twice to learn one player who has a particular role. The first time, you are given a list of players with that role. You may pray again to obtain the exact player name, however this has a{0} {1}% chance of revealing yourself to that player. Use "pray <role>" in PM to learn who has that role.
prophet_notify_none: You are a prophet. Each night you may pray to learn one player who has a particular role. Use "pray <role>" in PM to learn who has that role.
dullahan_targets_offline: All your targets are already offline!
dullahan_notify: You are a dullahan. Every night, you may kill someone by using "kill <nick>". You win when all your targets are offline.
succubus_notify: You are a succubus. You may entrance someone and make them follow you by visiting them at night. If all alive players are entranced, you win. Use "visit <nick>" to visit a player or "pass" to stay home. If you visit the victim of the trolls, you will be banned.
vigilante_notify: You are a vigilante. Each night, you may kill someone by using "kill <nick>", or "pass" to pass. If the person you kill is not a troll or a win stealer, you will be banned alongside your victim.
demoniac_notify: You are a demoniac. You win instead of the normal winners if all trolls are killed while you are alive.
priest_notify: You are a priest. Once per game during the day, you may bless someone with "bless <nick>" to prevent them from being killed. Furthermore, you may consecrate the offline during the day with "consecrate <nick>" to settle down restless spirits and prevent the corpse from rising as unoffline; doing so removes your ability to participate in the vote that day.
minion_notify: You are a minion. It is your job to help the trolls kill all of the users.
user_notify: You are a user. It is your job to ban all of the trolls.
cultist_notify: You are a cultist. It is your job to help the trolls kill all of the users.
blessed_notify: You feel incredibly safe. You are a blessed user.
welcome: {0}: Welcome to Weretroll, the popular detective/social party game (a theme of Mafia). Using the {1} game mode{2}.
invalid_mode_args: Invalid syntax for mode arguments. arg={0}
invalid_reveal: Did not recognize value {0} for role reveal. Allowed values: on, off, team
invalid_stats: Did not recognize value {0} for stats type. Allowed values: default, accurate, team, disabled
invalid_abstain: Did not recognize value {0} for abstain. Allowed values: enabled, restricted, disabled
invalid_lover_wins_with_unidan: Did not recognize value {0} for lover wins with unidan. Allowed values: true, false
lovers_win: Game over! The remaining users through their inseparable love for each other have agreed to stop all of this senseless violence and coexist in peace forever more. All remaining players win.
everyone_died_won: Game over! Everyone is offline, and it is in disconnection that they realize this is what they wanted all along. They remain offline and attend to their real life responsibilities forever. Everyone wins.
invalid_mode_roles: Invalid syntax for mode roles. arg={0}
bad_role_value: A bad value was used in mode roles.
evil_no_win: Game over! All the users are offline, but the cult needed to sacrifice the trolls to accomplish that. The cult disperses shortly thereafter, and nobody wins.
evil_user_win: Game over! All the trolls are offline! The users round up the remaining cultists, hang them, and live happily ever after.
evil_troll_win: Game over! All the users are offline! The cultists rejoice with their troll budgoes offline and start plotting to take over the next network.
evil_cultists_offline: Game over! All the cultists are offline! The now-exposed trolls are captured and killed by the remaining users. A BBQ party commences shortly thereafter.
evil_user_tie: Game over! There are the same number of users as cultists. They manage to regain control of the network and dispose of the remaining cultists.
evil_more_users: Game over! There are more users than cultists. They manage to regain control of the network and dispose of the remaining cultists.
guardian_troll_win: Game over! There are more trolls than unannoyed users. With the ancestral guardians offline, the trolls overpower the defenseless users and win.
guardian_troll_tie_no_guards: Game over! There are the same number of trolls as unannoyed users. With the ancestral guardians offline, the trolls overpower the defenseless users and win.
guardian_user_win: Game over! All the trolls are offline! The remaining users throw a party in honor of the guardian whiteknights that watched over the network, and live happily ever after.
guardian_lose_no_guards: Game over! The remaining users managed to destroy the trolls, however the guardians that used to watch over the network are nowhere to be found. The network lives on in an uneasy peace, not knowing when they will be destroyed completely now that they are defenseless.
guardian_lose_with_guards: Game over! The guardians, angered by the loss of everyone they were meant to guard, engage the trolls in battle. After the dust settles, the trolls remain standing.
sleepy_nightmare_begin: While walking through the woods, you hear the clopping of hooves behind you. Turning around, you see a large black horse with dark red eyes and flames where its mane and tail would be. After a brief period of time, it starts chasing after you! You think if you can cross the bridge over the nearby river you'll be safe, but your surroundings are almost unrecognizable in this darkness.
sleepy_nightmare_navigate: You can pm me "north", "east", "south", and "west", or their abbreviations "n", "e", "s", and "w" to navigate.
sleepy_nightmare_0: You find yourself deep in the heart of the woods, with imposing trees covering up what little light exists with their dense canopy. The paths here are very twisty, and it's easy to wind up going in circles if one is not careful. Directions are {0}.
sleepy_nightmare_1: You come across a small creek, the water babbling softly in the night as if nothing is amiss. As you approach, a flock of ravens bathing there disperses into all directions. Directions are {0}.
sleepy_nightmare_2: The treeline starts thinning and you start feeling fresh air for the first time in a while, you must be getting close to the edge of the woods! Directions are {0}.
sleepy_nightmare_wake: You break clear of the woods and see a roaring river ahead with a rope bridge going over it. You sprint to the bridge with the beast hot on your tail, your adrenaline overcoming your tired legs as you push yourself for one final burst. You make it across the bridge, and not a moment too soon as the sun starts rising up, causing you to wake from your dream in a cold sweat.
sleepy_nightmare_fake_1: You break clear of the woods and see a roaring river ahead. However, look as you may you are unable to find any means of crossing it. Knowing how expansive the river is, and how fast the beast can chase you if it isn't being slowed down by the foliage, you think it's best to look for the correct side of the woods again by going back in. Cursing your bad luck, you head back into the woods.
sleepy_nightmare_fake_2: You break clear of the woods only to find an expansive plains ahead of you, with no river in sight. You must have found your way out through the wrong side of the woods! Attempting to circle around the woods would result in the beast catching you in short order, so you softly curse at your bad luck as you head back into the woods to find the correct path.
sleepy_nightmare_invalid_direction: That way lies madness and certain disconnection.
sleepy_nightmare_restart: You find yourself back where you started...
sleepy_nightmare_disconnection: As the sun starts rising, your legs give out, causing the beast to descend upon you and snuff out your connection.
sleepy_priest_disconnection: The sky suddenly darkens as a thunderstorm appears from nowhere. The bell on the newly-abandoned church starts ringing in sinister tones before the building is struck repeatedly by lightning, setting it alight in a raging inferno...
sleepy_doomsayer_turn: You feel something rushing into you and taking control over your mind and body. It causes you to rapidly start transforming into a weretroll, and you realize your vision powers can now be used to inflict malady on the unwary. You are now a doomsayer.
sleepy_succubus_turn: You feel something rushing into you and taking control over your mind and body. You are now a succubus. Your job is to entrance the network, bringing them all under your absolute control.
sleepy_demoniac_turn: You feel something rushing into you and taking control over your mind and body, showing you your new purpose in life. There are far greater evils than the trolls lurking in the shadows, and by sacrificing all of the trolls, you can unleash those evils upon the world. You are now a demoniac.
fquit_fail: Forcing a live player to leave must be done in channel.
demoniac_win: Game over! All the trolls are banned! As the users start preparing the BBQ, a sudden flash illuminates the sky. Demonic spirits emerge around the sacrificed trolls and possess all users, causing the demoniac{0} to win.
succubus_win: Game over! The {0} {1} completely enthralled the network, making them officers in an ever-growing army set on spreading their {2} control and influence throughout the entire world.
dullahan_die_updoot: Before being banned, {0} snaps a whip made of a human spine at {1}; however, {1}'s updoot emits a brilliant flash of light, causing the attempt to miss.
dullahan_die_whiteknight: Before being banned, {0} snaps a whip made of a human spine at {1}; however, a guardian whiteknight was on duty and able to foil the attempt.
dullahan_die_op: Sensing danger, {2} shoves {1} aside to save them from {0}.
assassin_fail_blessed: {0} seems to be blessed, causing your assassination attempt to fail.
dullahan_die_success: Before being banned, {0} snaps a whip made of a human spine at {1}, disconnecting them. The network mourns the loss of a{2} {3}.
dullahan_die_success_noreveal: Before being banned, {0} snaps a whip made of a human spine at {1}, disconnecting them.
entranced_revert_win: You are no longer entranced. Your win conditions have reset to normal.
succubus_die_ban: As the last remaining succubus is banned, a foul curse causes {0} to wither away and die in front of the astonished network.
player_sick: You woke up today not feeling very well, you think it best to stay offline for the remainder of the day and night.
consecrating_no_vote: You are consecrating someone today and cannot participate in the vote.
illness_no_vote: You are staying home due to your illness and cannot participate in the vote.
already_blessed: You have already blessed someone this game.
blessed_success: You have given a blessing to {0}.
consecrate_fail: {0} is not currently playing or is not offline.
consecrate_success: You have consecrated the body of {0}.

pony_toss: {0} tosses a pony into the air...
cat_toss: {0} tosses a cat into the air...
vengeful_role: You are a vengeful ghost who is against the {0}.
annoyed_info: You were annoyed by an alpha troll and have {0} night{1} until your transformation.
no_command_in_channel: You cannot use this command in channel right now
admin_fleave_offlinechat: You have forced {0} to leave the offlinechat.
available_mode_setters_help: Votes to make a specific game mode more likely. Available game mode setters:
fspectate_restricted: You may not spectate while playing.
fspectate_bannedchat_disabled: bannedchat is disabled and may not be spectated.
maelstrom_banned: You are banned and cannot join again.
usergame_lose: Game over! The users realize too late that there are actually no trolls, and never manage to rebuild to what they had before this fiasco. Nobody wins. (Hint: next time if you suspect there are no trolls, have everyone {0}vote {1}.)
usergame_win: Game over! The users come to their senses and realize there are actually no trolls, the previous disconnections having been freak accidents. Everybody wins.
usergame_nope: Game over! The users decided incorrectly that there are actually no trolls, allowing the trolls to slaughter the remainder of them in their sleep with impunity.
stop_bot_ingame_safeguard: Warning: A game is currently running. If you want to {what} the bot anyway, use "{prefix}{cmd} -force".
invalid_restart_mode: {0} is not a valid mode. Valid modes are: {1}
fwarn_usage: Usage: fwarn list|view|add|del|set|help. See fwarn help <subcommand> for more details.
warn_usage: Usage: warn list|view|ack|help. See warn help <subcommand> for more details.
fwarn_page_invalid: Invalid page, must be a number 1 or greater.
fwarn_points_invalid: Invalid points, must be a non-negative integer.
fwarn_expiry_invalid: Invalid expiration, must be a number above 0 followed by either d, h, or m, or 'never' for a warning that never expires.
fwarn_cannot_add: Cannot add warning, double-check your parameters (the nick might be wrong or you are not joined to the channel).
fwarn_sanction_invalid: Invalid sanction, can be either deny, stasis, or tempban.
fwarn_stasis_invalid: Invalid stasis amount, specify sanction as "stasis=number".
fwarn_deny_invalid: Invalid denied commands, specify sanction as "deny=command,command,command" (without spaces).
fwarn_deny_invalid_command: Invalid command "{0}", specify sanction as "deny=command,command,command" (without spaces).
fwarn_tempban_invalid: Invalid tempban amount, specify sanction as "tempban=number" or "tempban=expiration" (followed by d, h, or m).
fwarn_list_header: {0} has {1} active warning point{2}. Warnings prefixed with ! are unacknowledged.
warn_list_header: You have {0} active warning point{1}. You must acknowledge all warnings prefixed with ! by using "warn ack <id>" before you can join games.
fwarn_list_footer: More results are available, use fwarn list {0} to view them.
warn_list_footer: More results are available, use warn list {0} to view them.
fwarn_invalid_warning: The specified warning id does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.
fwarn_view_header: Warning #{0}, given to {1} on {2} by {3}. {4} point{5}. {6}.
fwarn_view_ack: Warning has not yet been acknowledged.
warn_view_ack: You have not yet acknowledged this warning. You must acknowledge this warning by using "warn ack {0}" before you can join games.
fwarn_view_tempban: banned until {0} (if a number, indicates warning point threshold).
fwarn_reason_required: A public warning reason is required.
warn_unacked: You have unacknowledged warnings and cannot join at this time. Use "warn list" to view them.
no_templates: There are no access templates defined.

no_access: There are no users with access.
no_access_account: Account {0} does not have any access.
no_access_host: Host {0} does not have any access.
leave_warning: Leaving during game. If you think you may have to leave shortly after a game would start, !leave during the join phase instead.
idle_warning: Idling out during game. If you !join please pay attention to the channel and ensure that your client notifies you when highlighted.
part_warning: Parting during game. You only have a short time to re-join the channel after parting to stay alive.
quit_warning: Quitting IRC during game. You only have a short time to re-join the channel after quitting to stay alive.
acc_warning: Changing accounts during game. Please do not change accounts while playing.
